title: Typewriter to go with Dolly
content:
Any suggestions for a typewriter (font or actual machine) to work well with Dolly?

 [‹ Desperate help regarding Paperback needed!](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121131348/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41203 "Go to previous forum topic") [Design and type usage in Java applications ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121131348/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41465 "Go to next forum topic")
author: frode frank

comments.content: Too bad that Underware’s [Sauna Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121131348/http:/www.underware.nl/site2/index.php3?id1=underware&id2=custom-type&id3=sauna-mono), custom designed for the Danish Jyske Bank, is not available for general use. Maybe Lucida Typewriter? I’d be interested in getting an actual machine typewriter to work well with Dolly, though.
I’ve been scanning around the shops here in Bergen looking for just the right one;)
That Monospasz seems very nice, but the regular is a bit to narrow and the extended a bit to wide in my opinion.
